Entries.summer_Tue10: It's so hot and dry outside, I'm glad I have air conditioning in here...$h
Entries.6_2: Ohh, @, did you do something new with your hair?
Entries.7_2: @, do you think I should start carrying some snacks or something like that?
Entries.8_2: I found this coconut this morning, before I opened up the store. Here, you take it.[88]$h

Entries.6_2: My shops not in a great location for business but at least I can afford the rent.
Entries.8_2: About twenty years back this was a bustling truck stop. But we've haven't had that much traffic for a long time.$s
Entries.9_2: Emily and I were thinking of hitting up {{i18n:restaurant.{{Random:01, 02, 03, 04, 05, 06}} }} sometime soon. You interested?$h
Entries.11_2: Someone came in the other day and went into the back room over there. Didn't come out for hours.#$b#Sometimes I worry about what's going on back there.
Entries.12_2: I grew up in Pelican Town, but I came out here to run my shop since business used to be really good around here.#$b#Lots of truckers stopping by, lots of hikers...
Entries.13_2: @, what do you think about going hiking?#$b#It's too hot for me, but I used to see so many people hiking in this area...
Entries.14_2: Those mines...those mines didn't used to be so overrun with monsters...$s#$b#Back when the mine was more actively developed, the monsters would stay away more.

Entries.6_2: I hear the cliffs around here are good for bouldering, but I haven't personally tried myself.
